Summary: A light that appeared in the sky, moved, then stayed there.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Unknown
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was camping with a group of friends in Washington, Missouri. It was late, and we were sitting out watching the stars. Then we saw a meteor. Then another. In the space of about about 10 minutes, there were 20 meteors. About a minute after the meteors stopped, something else, which I thought was a meteor at first, appeared. It was reddish and very slightly brighter than the stars around it. It stayed there for about 1 minute. It then moved what would be roughly six inches if held at arm's length to the northwest over a course of about 2 seconds, and just stayed there for another 2 minutes or so, then faded and disappeared. ~Mad Vulcan
